TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Payuwan, title = Payuwan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Payuwan} }

S.FORM: == Payuwan == u sulit nu Hulam: : u siwkay nu niyazu' i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Payuwan. u kasalumaluma' nu Payuwan sa, 156 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 531 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 518 ku tademaw, pakalatu 98%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 13 ku tademaw, pakalatu 2%. u asip nu cidekay a tademaw u kasabinacadan, Paywan(Paiwan) 91%, Rukay(Rukai) 1%, Tayan(Tayal) 2%, Pangcah(Amis) 1%, Yuwatan(Bunun) 1%, zumazuma 3%. u niyazu' nu Paywan u Paywan a niyazu' kuyni. tuud ku Paywan a tademaw itiniay a niyazu'. u Sakizaya a tademaw inayay ku Sakizaya itini. u zuma a tademaw sa u Rukay u Pangcah atu Puyuma u cidekay nu Taywan a Incumin: u Sakizaya a binacadan azihan i u Pangcah(Amis) a binacadan azihan i u Tayal a binacadan azihan i u Paywan a binacadan azihan i u Bunun a binacadan azihan i u Piyuma a binacadan azihan i u Rukay a binacadan azihan i u Takuku a binacadan azihan i u Sejek a binacadan azihan i u Saysia a binacadan azihan i u Kabalan a binacadan azihan i u Kanakanabu a binacadan azihan i u Laaluwa a binacadan azihan i u Saw a binacadan azihan i u Chou a binacadan azihan i u Tau a binacadan azihan i

== Payowan == o solit no Holam: : o siwkay no niyazo' i Pingtong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Payowan. o kasalomaloma' no Payowan sa, 156 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 531 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 518 ko tademaw, pakalato 98%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 13 ko tademaw, pakalato 2%. o asip no cidekay a tademaw o kasabinacadan, Paywan(Paiwan) 91%, Rokay(Rokai) 1%, Tayan(Tayal) 2%, Pangcah(Amis) 1%, Yowatan(Bonon) 1%, zomazoma 3%. o niyazo' no Paywan o Paywan a niyazo' koyni. tood ko Paywan a tademaw itiniay a niyazo'. o Sakizaya a tademaw inayay ko Sakizaya itini. o zoma a tademaw sa o Rokay o Pangcah ato Poyoma o cidekay no Taywan a Incomin: o Sakizaya a binacadan azihan i o Pangcah(Amis) a binacadan azihan i o Tayal a binacadan azihan i o Paywan a binacadan azihan i o Bonon a binacadan azihan i o Piyoma a binacadan azihan i o Rokay a binacadan azihan i o Takoko a binacadan azihan i o Sejek a binacadan azihan i o Saysia a binacadan azihan i o Kabalan a binacadan azihan i o Kanakanabo a binacadan azihan i o Laalowa a binacadan azihan i o Saw a binacadan azihan i o Choo a binacadan azihan i o Tao a binacadan azihan i
